explanation: [0-0] In a football stadium, two players in yellow and two in black are standing on the field. A referee in blue stands in the middle. There is a football on the ground, and numerous spectators in the distant stands.

[0-5] The referee in blue blows the whistle. The two men in yellow shirts run towards the football on the ground. As they move, the camera pans left, showing several players in black standing nearby. One of the players in yellow kicks the ball powerfully. The camera continues to pan left, following the ball as it flies over the heads of the players in black and finally enters the goal. The players in yellow wave their arms and run in celebration.

[5-11] The scene then cuts to a running player in a yellow shirt sprinting across the grass. The camera moves right with him, revealing another man in a yellow shirt with a beard. They run forward together, joined by a player in a black shirt who approaches from the opposite direction. The player in black reaches out and hugs the player in yellow. Then the bearded man in the yellow shirt runs over and joins the hug. More and more people come running up, and they celebrate the exhilarating moment together, reveling in the joy of the goal.
